column2: Activities
Supporting the Export of agricultural crops
Identification of farmers and conducting basic awareness on cultivation of export agriculture crops
Make Initial arrangement with DEA for the supply of Plants.
Supply and distribution of plants (Coffee, Pepper, Vanilla, Clove, Ginger)
Conducting awareness quality improvement and minimizing post-harvest losses
Monitoring and supervision
Supporting paddy cultivation
Identification and signing of MoU with selected farmers
Conducting basic awareness of the “Parachute method”
Arranging of farmers contribution (50% of the cost)
Supply and distribution of seed planting trays
Monitoring and supervision
Supporting the protection of crops from animals
Identification and signing of MoU with selected farmers
Conduct awareness on agricultural crop protection from wild animals
Arranging of farmer contribution (50% of the cost)
Supply and distributions of electric fence (Viduli Pambaya)
Monitoring and supervision
Implementation of protected agricultural methods (polytunnel)
Identification and signing of MoU with selected farmers
Conduct awareness on protected agriculture
Arranging of farmer contribution (50% of the cost)
Supply and distribution of polytunnel
Monitoring and supervision
Supporting fruit cultivation (Banna, Mango, Avocado)
Identification of farmers and conducting basic awareness of cultivation
Land preparation for cultivation
Supply and distribution of fruit plants to the farmers
Monitoring and supervision
Introducing value addition and new technology
Identification and signing of MoU with selected farmers/ producers
Conducting basic awareness on processing

Supply and distribution of the following machines and Equipment to the farmers and producers - Black pepper-making machines (Balancing kit), White pepper production machines, Curry powder grinding, Jackfruit drying machines, Alimana chopper machines, and Ginger slicing machines. Areca nut slicing machines, Incubator (Chick hatching)
Monitoring and supervision
Supporting animal husbandry
Identification and signing of MOU with selected farmers
Conducting basic awareness programs
Supply and providing of suitable animals - Cows, Goat, Chicks
Providing support to construction of sheds, Sheds – cow, Sheds – goat
Monitoring and supervision
Supporting vegetable cultivation
Identification of farmers and conducting basic awareness on cultivation
Supply and distribution of vegetable seeds (Capsicum, Cabbages, Green Chili, Beans, Tomato)
Conducting awareness on minimizing of post-harvest losses
Monitoring and supervision
